revised_title: Fracture Mechanics in Design and Service: A Review of Fracture Toughness Determination and Definition
tldr: This article discusses the principles and methods of fracture mechanics, focusing on the determination and definition of fracture toughness. It covers topics such as the size effect, compliance, linear-elastic crack tip stresses, and standard specimen types used in fracture toughness measurements. The article also highlights the importance of valid measurements and the influence of material properties and testing conditions on fracture behavior.
